game - Variable in class it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.character.advanced.AdvancedCharacter
 
Game - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.game_model
This object manage the creation and development of the game:
Game(int) - Constructor for class it.polimi.ingsw.game_model.Game
Given the number of players in the current game, set up the number of students on the cloud cards, the number of students to draw from the bag at the beginning of the game and the number of towers for each player.
